recipe_name: Homemade baked beans with cherry tomatoes, garlic and sausage
author: Lesley Waters
method: Heat the butter in a small pan and fry the onion, garlic and pancetta for 4-5 minutes. Add the butter beans, tomato purée, sugar, Tabasco sauce, red wine and cherry tomatoes and simmer for 4-5 minutes. To serve, place the baked beans into a serving dish and top with the sausage and ciabatta.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter,  ½ onion, chopped,  1 smoked garlic clove, chopped,  2 rashers pancetta, chopped,  200g/7oz tinned butter beans, rinsed and drained,  1 tbsp tomato purée,  2 tsp brown sugar,  dash Tabasco sauce,  2 tbsp red wine,  200g/7oz tinned cherry tomatoes,  1 smoked sausage, griddled and sliced,  2 slices ciabatta, toasted
